description:
Chise is a very shy and clumsy girl, whose only good at World History. Trying to overcome her low self-esteem, and with the help of her friend Akemi, she asks out Shuuji. After a rough start, the two seem to hit it off, and fall in love.
Shuuji eventually learns that Chise has been turned into the ultimate weapon by the military, and has to constantly fight in the ongoing war, of which both know very little about. Chise increasingly suffers from the guilt of what she does in the battlefield, and starts believing she doesn`t deserve happiness. Feeling more and more like a weapon, she tries to cling to the last shreds of her fading humanity - her love for Shuuji.
name: Chise
